description: As a Software Engineer, Associate at Infor, you will be part of a team responsible for researching, maintaining, and enhancing a large ERP cloud suite application. You will work on software maintenance, development, and testing using various technologies including C# and SQL DB. Additionally, you will review and contribute to functional business requirements, exercise judgment in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining solutions, and demonstrate a desire to learn and adapt to the latest technologies.
responsibilities: Work as part of a team to research, maintain, and enhance a large ERP cloud suite application.
Perform software maintenance, development, and testing using technologies such as C# and SQL DB.
Exercise judgment in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining solutions for application defects.
Review and contribute to functional business requirements.
Demonstrate a desire to learn and adapt to the latest technologies.
qualifications: Candidates should have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or Information Technology. Strong analytic problem-solving skills with attention to detail are required. Proficiency in Microsoft Stack Technologies including Visual Studio, C#, .Net, and Powershell is necessary. Candidates should also have experience with database server development and performance (SQL), ability to manage multiple tasks, and good verbal and written communication skills.
Studying for BE/Btech in computer science/SW engineering
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
BA/BS in Computer Science, Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Literature Cognitive Science, Experimental
BTech, MTech, or Ph.D. in Computer Science or related technical discipline
